entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the morning then changing to flurries near noon and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
